name: Cinnabon
description: Cinnabon is one of the cafes that wanted to create its own online shop on the base of Novadine platform, but also add some customizations.
goals: Customize a Novadine platform flow according to specific requirements
solutions: Remade the registration functionality to be optional
Designed a new user flow for a payment process (made one custom page instead of four predefined pages)
outcome: Full development cycle of the multitenancy instance for a customer, from the design to the production.
